snippet: An Egyptian court sentenced to death 14 people it said were Islamist militants for a deadly attack on a police station in North Sinai last year, a court official said Tuesday.
abstract: Egyptian court sentences 14 people to death, claiming they are Islamist militants who waged a deadly attack on a police station in North Sinai in 2011.
lead_paragraph: An Egyptian court sentenced to death 14 people it said were Islamist militants for a deadly attack on a police station in North Sinai last year, a court official said Tuesday.

headline.seo: Egyptian Court Sentences 14 in Deadly Sinai Attack
